begSection.title: CollAction for Business, Education and Governance
begSection.description: CollAction organises 3 types of CrowdActions: CollAction for Business, Education and Governance. Each situation has a unique target audience, social structure and communication channels, so we tailor our CrowdActions accordingly.

projectSection.title: Take action for a better world
projectSection.description: We work together to achieve your collective action goals

crowdaction.title: CrowdActions
crowdaction.description: CrowdActions are the basis of our endeavor. It is the common goal of each CrowdAction that unites people of similar convictions

explore.title: Explore CrowdActions
explore.description: Here you can explore all of our upcoming, on-going and previous crowdactions
